name: feedlynx
description: FeedLynx is a small self-hosted service for subscribing a website’s feed directly into a user’s feed reader via web-based subscriptions. It provides a simple UI and acts as a helper between visitors and feed applications.
features: Feed Subscription: Web-based feed subscriptions, Simple UI, Direct reader integration. Easy feed discovery.
Helper Service: Bridge between websites and readers. Seamless subscription flow.
Self-Hosted: Run your own subscription service. Privacy-focused.
Visitor-Friendly: One-click feed subscriptions. User-friendly experience.
Multiple Readers: Support various RSS clients. Universal compatibility.
Custom Branding: Personalize the interface. Your style.
Lightweight: Minimal server requirements. Quick deployment.
Open Protocol: Standard feed formats. Wide support.
